entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rigolet

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Monday 17 April 2023
